Class StoreIMP

java.lang.Object
StoreIMP
All Implemented Interfaces:
Store
public final class StoreIMP extends Object implements Store
This class implements the interface Store of the A03 Final Project, representing the management of a store
. We make the class final, to avoid any further class specialising it more.

      This method attempts to remove a customer from the store
      Specified by:
      removeUser in interface Store
      Parameters:
      _userID - - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      (-1) if customer does not exist; (-2) if not possible to remove as it has active purchases; 0 if removed.
